page.title: 15DAY IN THE LIFE OF HOLLI.
page.content: I am{Holli Broomfield}and I live with my mum, dad, brother Aaron at West- away,{a guesthouse;}we came to Cormwall from Canada in October. Dad awoke at seven to feed our chickens and collect the eggs.At 8.30 I helped mum give our{six guests} breakfast while dad cooked.Later I helped wash dishes. At nine the{chambermaid}arrived to tidy the bedrooms.Dad baked scones for the{afternoon cream teas}and I watched Wimbledon on T.V. Nine people had lunch in the garden; cheese or crab salad.After washing the dishes we prepared the trays for cream teas; available from 1.30pm until 6.30pm. At 6.35pm dad and I served the{ {evening meals;}soup, salad and beef Bourguignon.Mum washed up and at nine o'clock I had a bath and went to bed.
